code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{API_URL,ENDPOINTS}from'./global/Constants';import axios from'axios';import'./assets/styles/theme/Variables.css';import'./assets/styles/theme/General.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[characters,setCharacters]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL).concat(ENDPOINTS.characters));setCharacters(response.data.results);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Rick and Morty Characters"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:characters.map(character=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:character.image,alt:character.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:character.name})]},character.id))})]});};export default App;
